H0.text: what type of government did mexico have. Constitutional Monarchy

H1.text: what type of government did mexico have. Parliamentary Democracy

H2.text: what type of government did mexico have. Presidential System

H3.text: what type of government did mexico have. Federal republic

A4.text: Mexico is a federal republic with a presidential system of government.

A5.text: The United Mexican States is a federation whose government is representative, democratic, and republican based on a presidential system according to the 1917 Constitution.

A6.text: the central government established by its constitution to share sovereignty over the republic with the governments of the 31 individual Mexican states

A7.text: The President of the United Mexican States is the head of state, the head of government, and the supreme commander of the Armed Forces
